name: B.U.G.S. - Bots Under Great Strife
description:
Made for the Fall 2022 DevLUp Game Jam with the them 'choose just one.'

Controls -  WASD to move, click to attack.

Brody (UF) - programming

JJ (UF) - art, music, sfx

Fight through multiple levels, choosing one bug bot to play as and battling the rest.
